Articles.Content:
1067: There is a poster announcing that you are now 3856.16 meters up.

(assuming that this is a semi-normal type of building)
1068: Docks for more shops similar to the ones in 1066.
1068: Red Iron Crown and Green Iron Crown are arguing over who's spaceship produces prettier explosions.
1069: (How many more floors in this building?!) CHICKENS!!!!!!
1070: Freddy's Pizza Emporium. Don't mind the darkened lights, we're working a few issues out with security.

Floor 1070.5 and it was big, scary and PINK

Edited February 24, 2015 by cbplayer2012

10171: A large, empty room. There is a sign in the middle. It says: "Give me the spaceship of the Bubble-Ship type, I am at floor 1075. I will give you a prize if you give me the ship. If not, something bad will happen."
1072: Shattered from a crash. Remainings of a ship, sometimes with plaques reading "NCC-1701" can be seen. Other than that, only corpses.

1073: The apparently surviving crew of the NCC-1701 crash site. Not a single person wearing red is present unlike the floor below, except for some crazy Scotsman who keeps yelling at a guy in yellow that he can't break the laws of physics. Dismissing this as 'mildly unusual' in comparison to other floors in this tower, you carry on up to 1074.

1074: Anna and Elsa from Frozen launching small model KSP rockets with little Kerbals on them out of the window, and you think that they launched one that brought down the NCC-7101 ship. Another mildly unusual floor.

1075

A dull room....

Nothing in hear, move along.

Floor 1076:

The room is pitch black apart from the light from the stairwell across the room. You can hear absolutely nothing. With your spine tingling you sprint to the stairwell, and as you look over your shoulder you swear you see something moving in the darkness...

Floor 1077:

LOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOL

Nyan Catz!!!!!

Meme Land!!!!!
1078: Jeb. And a controller. And an SRB. Better get going.

1079:

you get a dizzying feeling...
1080: You suddenly feel as though everything has gone HD. Proclaiming "Neat", you continue onwards.
Floor 1081: You suddenly see violent colours streaming everywhere.

Floor 1082:

A Rainbow and some bacon.

Our guy didn't eat for a very long time.
Floor 1083: FNAF3 confirmed.
Floor 1084: the Avalon-A, Enterprise-E, Millennium Falcon, and death star train weapons on floor 1083 to contain the FANF idiocy.
Floor 1085: Space suits provided to go higher up (elevator locked until space suit is donned)

Floor 1086 with space suit donned you notice oxygen levels falling. seems jeb used it last and forgot to re-fill it. You continue on fingers crossed breathing as little as possible as you ascend further up
floor 1087: you get a phone call with this digital number => 10 00 00 00 00 <= so cool ; )
Floor 1088: sniparz and his elite team of quickscopers aiming at you
1089: The room has a Post-It note saying "I told you so." And billions of crocodiles lurking in every corner
